title: Best of The Herd: 06/16/2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 06/16/2020
description:
Colin defends Rob Manfred while giving his concerns for MLB. why he is laughing at the boycott crowd, and his thoughts on the Mike Gundy-Chuba Hubbard drama.


Guests: Fox Sports host Chris Broussard and former Patriot/Raider Richard Seymour

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
